localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Translate words straight from your Alfred launcher: - Open Alfred - Type a language combination and a word: `fren fromage` - Press enter to open the results page on WordReference! Get access to 48 dictionaries across 18 different languages!
blogPost.body: Translate words straight from your Alfred launcher: - Open Alfred - Type a language combination and a word: `fren fromage` - Press enter to open the results page on WordReference! Get access to 48 dictionaries across 18 different languages!
blogPost.title: WordReference for Alfred - Multilingual translations at your fingertips!
blogPost.author: Alex Martin

localize.description: 直接从您的Alfred启动器翻译单词： - 打开Alfred - 输入语言组合和单词：`fren fromage` - 按回车键打开WordReference上的结果页面! 获得跨越18种不同语言的48种词典的访问权限!
直接從您的Alfred啓動器翻譯單詞： - 打開Alfred - 輸入語言組合和單詞：`fren fromage` - 按回車鍵打開WordReference上的結果頁面! 獲得跨越18種不同語言的48種詞典的訪問權限!

previous.excerpt: Meetings won't feel like they go on forever anymore. Zoom Agenda lets you create an agenda and add a timer to every agenda item so you know how long to spend discussing about each item.
previous.title: Zoom Agenda Timer - Create a timer for your agenda items on Zoom.

localize.description: 会议不会再有永远进行下去的感觉。Zoom Agenda可以让您创建一个议程，并为每个议程项目添加一个计时器，这样您就可以知道每个项目的讨论时间。
localize.tagline: 在Zoom上为您的议程项目创建一个定时器。

localize.description: 會議不會再有永遠進行下去的感覺。Zoom Agenda可以讓您創建一個議程，併爲每個議程項目添加一個計時器，這樣您就可以知道每個項目的討論時間。
localize.tagline: 在Zoom上爲您的議程項目創建一個定時器。

next.excerpt: A Powerful Mac* App to... • zoom into pixels • measure angles & distances • sample colors and maintain palettes • check alignments • real-time color-blindness and color-contrast • take snapshots • real-time distances and bounding boxes..and much, much more.
next.title: QuickLens - Inspect the UI of apps, illustrations & websites like a PRO!

localize.description: 一款功能强大的Mac*应用程序，用于... - 缩放像素 - 测量角度和距离 - 采样颜色和维护调色板 - 检查对齐 - 实时色盲和色彩对比 - 拍摄快照 - 实时距离和边界框......以及更多。
localize.tagline: 像专业人员一样检查应用程序、插图和网站的用户界面!

localize.description: 一款功能強大的Mac*應用程序，用於... - 縮放像素 - 測量角度和距離 - 採樣顏色和維護調色板 - 檢查對齊 - 實時色盲和色彩對比 - 拍攝快照 - 實時距離和邊界框......以及更多。
localize.tagline: 像專業人員一樣檢查應用程序、插圖和網站的用戶界面!
